title: Drawing, "View from Mount Salus, Jamaica", June 1865
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center: Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with figures throughout entire sheet, and at top: blue; again, at bottom left: Mt. Salus / June 1865; and at center bottom:  2 - delicious soft brown glow / 3 - soft orange light / 4 - delicate grey - flowing into / 5 - more purple and a little deeper / 6 - delicious rich strong lively green
description: Horizontal landscape view with a wooded slope in the foreground, hills rising in the middle distance to mountains covered by a cloudy sky.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "View from Mount Salus, Jamaica", June 1865.
June 1865. Graphite on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-374.
